call_id.name: Call ID
call_id.description: Unique identifier of the call leg

call_direction.name: Direction
call_direction.description: Direction of the call, relative to the media switch

hangup_cause.name: Hangup Cause
hangup_cause.description: The reason for the call leg's termination

hangup_code.name: Hangup Code
hangup_code.description: The SIP hangup code, if available

disposition.name: Hangup Disposition
disposition.description: Who sent the SIP BYE message

request.name: Request
request.description: Built by Kazoo this is the processed request URI

from.name: From
from.description: Built by Kazoo, depending on direction, to represent the From user

to.name: To
to.description: Built by Kazoo, depending on direction, to represent the To user

ringing_seconds.name: Ringing (seconds)
ringing_seconds.description: How many seconds the leg was ringing (pre-answer)

billing_seconds.name: Billing (seconds)
billing_seconds.description: The number of seconds the call leg can be billed for (typically from when the call leg is answered

duration_seconds.name: Duration (seconds)
duration_seconds.description: The duration of the call leg, in seconds

timestamp.name: Timestamp (Gregorian seconds)
timestamp.description: UTC timestamp, in gregorian seconds, of when the CDR was generated

user_agent.name: SIP User Agent
user_agent.description: User agent header from SIP packet

caller_id_number.name: Caller ID Number
caller_id_number.description: The indicated number of the caller

caller_id_name.name: Caller ID Name
caller_id_name.description: The indicated name of the caller

callee_id_number.name: Callee ID Number
callee_id_number.description: The indicated number of the callee

callee_id_name.name: Callee ID Name
callee_id_name.description: The indicated name of the callee

presence_id.name: Presence ID
presence_id.description: ID used in NOTIFY SIP messages

remote_sdp.name: Remote SDP
remote_sdp.description: The SDP negotiated by the remote agent

local_sdp.name: Local SDP
local_sdp.description: The SDP negotiated by the local agent

custom_channel_vars.name: CCVs
custom_channel_vars.description: Kazoo-specific key/value pairs set on the channel

custom_sip_headers.name: Custom SIP Headers
custom_sip_headers.description: A property list of SIP headers beging with the prefix 'X-'

digits_dialed.name: Digits Dialed
digits_dialed.description: All the DTMF tones detected on this leg of the call

other_leg_call_id.name: Other Leg Call ID
other_leg_call_id.description: If this leg was bridged, the call-id of the opposite leg

other_leg_caller_id_name.name: Other Leg Caller ID Name
other_leg_caller_id_name.description: Caller ID name of the bridged leg

other_leg_caller_id_number.name: Other Leg Caller ID Number
other_leg_caller_id_number.description: Caller ID number of the bridged leg

other_leg_destination_number.name: Other Leg Destination
other_leg_destination_number.description: Dialed number of the other leg

other_leg_direction.name: Other Leg Direction
other_leg_direction.description: direction of the other leg, relative to the media server

media_server.name: Media Server
media_server.description: The hostname of the media server that processed the call

node.name: Erlang Node
node.description: The ecallmgr which issued the CDR

app_version.name: Application Version
app_version.description: The internal Kazoo version number of the application that issued the CDR

app_name.name: Application Name
app_name.description: The Kazoo application that issued the CDR
